desc: I need an Android app.  I would like it designed and built.  This is an app for OCD sufferers that as part of their therapy use a desensitization technique. The app must be secure with password protection It would need to record a short sentence which would appear both in writing as well as a recording of individuals voice. Once recorded a choice of repetition up to 1000 times and/or constant repetition for x minutes. The words spoken will also flash up on the screen. Some creativity can be used here in size and don't also colour. It could also be developed further utilising pictures where appropriate that appear on screen simultaneously as words are spoken. I would like to retain the patent or rights to this app and it would likely be in the first instance a draught to be reviewed by psychologists/therapists for their opinion with Is this possible at all for a small budget? I am a previous sufferer working with a well known OCD therapist that would oversee any work and assist in developments Not entirely sure what else to write. I think further development would come from getting something basic into a format and going from tbere 150 words? Must be somewhere near? Email address is acerconservation@[url removed, login to view] for further correspondence
title: Mobile development

desc: We are building a mobile App for the blind to improve their daily life.There are approximately 350 million people in the world with low or no vision.They generally lead very closed and isolated lives.Vision Impaired people are challenged every single day, many of them struggle with daily life, catching a bus or a train is fraught with problems, shopping at the supermarket or navigating their way to school or work is a constant hazard, constantly relying on strangers who you don't know and can't see for help.Buddy App aims to change the lives of vision impaired people, by using state of the art computer vision and machine learning to provide commentary on the world around them.It uses our own Computer Vision API (customised API with Tensorflow and Keras backend) which has had extensive development and turns object recognition into speech.We need a keen and competent React Native coder with experience integrating machine learning code onto mobile devices.Please only bid on this job if you have real experience in React Native and prefer working on this. Do not bid if you prefer to develop in native code.Please provide a link to an APK showing your work that I can download and test and any other links for your machine learning experience.IMPORTANTFreelancer must- Update daily via slack- Commit daily to github- sign to an IP assignment agreement- no false bids, please bid the price you are willing to work for, false bids will be reported.
title: Mobile Tensorflow with React Native - Social Good Project - Make an Impact

desc: Hello,Hope everyone is doing well. Reachout is an app designed to help people who are fighting life-threatening diseases like heart disease, cancer, diabetes etc. ([url removed, login to view]) I wanted to invite anyone who might be interested in beta testing the new version of the app. This is a complete revamp of the app and we are looking to do this testing in 7 days. For this, we need 3-4 ios and 3-4 Android testers.  Since this is a completely free app aimed to help people, my budget is very limited. I am happy to pay $2 per bug discovered. Full list of all bugs found are available as a shared document for all to review at all times.Please notify me at the earliest if you are interested in doing this testing. Please note that since the tester slots are limited this time, please ensure that you are able to dedicate time to this if you are chosen. Testing will begin for Android in the next 4 days and iOS early next week.Thanks and I look forward to working together once again.Sunil
title: Beta testing Apps for Android and iOS

desc: Fit Kitchen is a personalised fresh fit food delivery service that uses creative technology like its intuitive meal creator to deliver perfectly balanced meals and shakes to your home or office based on your lifestyle and goals.What are we looking for?An innovative company or individual with swift/ios app development experience to develop an app for us that can allow (apple and android) customers to:To sign up like they do on our website with added Facebook linkedin and Google integrationThe app generates meal suggestions based on our meal creator technology like on our siteCreate meal plans based on their profiles (only available on app)Track their calories (similar to my fitness pal) but they manually enter per meal (proteins fats carbs and cals) (only available on app)To manage their accounts and deliveries. Reorder their favourite meals i.e they may have saved breakfast high day and breakfast low day or post bootcamp meal or rest day shake. The app will enable them to easily select these and order from a click of a buttonFor future the app should also have location services enabled as we will be delivering into London within 1hr or order from July/August.The app should be linked to our backend system and be fully self content manageable. For example if we update ingredients or menu items on the system it syncs with the app.What do you need to do?Submit a concept design image (or images) of the app and an animation for our home screen (like Uber’s home screen, but for food) In your concepts please detail the app functions and screenshots and layout. You need to submit these by (REMOVED BY [url removed, login to view] ADMIN) to us no later than 13th July 2017. We will announce who has won the contract on 15th July 2017Submit your final price offer which will include budget for corrections and further development as requiredIn your (REMOVED BY [url removed, login to view] ADMIN) proposal submission you need to know how you will complete the project by 1st August 2017. We would need to know the following:How many people in your team?Who will be our lead contact and their credentials?What hours (UK time) will we be able to speak daily until project is done?How will the submissions and resubmissions to apple and Google be managed?Do you have access to whats app? We will set up a working group.
title: Write an iPhone application
